title: Drift Race
description: When Leon attends a drift competition he rediscovers his past and his passion. He befriends Simon, a championship winner, and spirals into the world of adrenaline, fast cars and high speed chases.Soon he becomes a top drift racer himself, but little does he know that this new and exciting world is filled with danger, crime and even death. Can he overcome those who will stop at nothing to beat him?"Action packed from cover to cover."- Todd Wylie, Editor - NZV8 Magazine"Awesome book, don't miss it."- Brendan Stone, Drift GP Romania Champion"A great read."- Daynom Templeman, International Drift Competitor
author: David Jubermann
